title: Tesla Stock Is Falling. It's Been Having a Good Run.
text: LIVE UPDATES | CONCLUDED Last Updated: February 29, 2024 at 7:55 PM EST 30 days ago Tesla stock has enjoyed a three-day rally but looks set to open down Thursday a day after CEO Elon Musk revealed details about the timing of the launch of the Roadster sports car. Advertisement - Scroll to Continue
